attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My partner and I own our property and have been a victim of Anti-social behavior for the past two years due to our upstairs neighbours. This horrendous problem ranges from verbal and threatening behavior to our windows being smashed, being spat on, car and fence damaged, our gas and heating messed around with, burgled. And the list goes on.
We have been living in a nightmare.
Our local council have not been helpfull enough at all! We have sent more than enough diary forms and still no action has been taken. Other than a few complaint letters to them which just makes things worse. We also have got our local MP involved, so it seems to be moving somewhere now. We need these discusting people moved as we really cannot take anymore abuse and anxiety.
Please help! There needs to be a clamp down on Anti-Social behavior to stop anyone else going through the same misery.

Vicky Jones
